layout.dados: select coalesce((select sum(valor) from movto where conta_creditar='2.1.1' and vencto=$data::date+1), 0) as cpag1, coalesce((select sum(valor) from movto where conta_creditar='2.1.1' and vencto=$data::date+2),0) as cpag2, coalesce((select sum(valor) from movto where conta_creditar='2.1.1' and vencto=$data::date+3),0) as cpag3, coalesce((select sum(valor) from movto where conta_creditar='2.1.1' and vencto=$data::date+4),0) as cpag4, coalesce((select sum(valor) from movto where conta_creditar='2.1.1' and vencto=$data::date+5),0) as cpag5
